style: Flat Minimalist Vector, Y2K Aesthetic, Screen Printed Texture, Conceptual Illustration
use_case: Motivational posters, indie brand merchandise design, album art, social media quote graphics.
template: A simple and happy [SUBJECT] illustration, [SCENE], centered, conceptual graphic, vector art, flat minimalist design, thick black outline, using only the accent color [COLOR] and black on a textured pale grey kraft paper background, bold motivational text overlay for a [MOOD] theme, high contrast, screen print quality, perfect alignment, extreme paper grain detail. --ar 4:5

variable_explanations.SUBJECT: The main object or character replacing the flower (e.g., Coffee Cup, Sad Astronaut, Goldfish).
variable_explanations.SCENE: The context or action of the subject, replacing the 'in a pot with roots' concept (e.g., Bursting through concrete, Floating free in space, Trapped inside a small glass dome).
variable_explanations.COLOR: The single primary accent color used for the subject (e.g., Neon Green, Deep Purple, Muted Teal).
variable_explanations.MOOD: The emotional tone and theme of the overlaid motivational message (e.g., Growth and Change, Perseverance, Quiet Solitude, Radical Self-Acceptance).

variables.SCENE: Spinning in a mid-century living room
variables.SUBJECT: A playful vinyl record

examples.prompt: A simple and happy playful vinyl record illustration, Spinning in a mid-century living room, centered, conceptual graphic, vector art, flat minimalist design, thick black outline, using only the accent color Ruby Red and black on a textured pale grey kraft paper background, bold motivational text overlay for a Joy theme, high contrast, screen print quality, perfect alignment, extreme paper grain detail. --ar 4:5

tips: Use desaturated colors for [COLOR] to better mimic the 'screen print on grey paper' effect.
Keep [SUBJECT] and [SCENE] conceptually simple and high-contrast (e.g., 'A lightbulb' 'plugged into a tiny brick').
The model will generate text based on the [MOOD]. For better text quality, specify simple, declarative sentences within the MOOD variable.
description: This template replicates the highly sought-after aesthetic of modern minimalist graphic design mixed with vintage screenprint texture. It features flat, high-contrast shapes, a limited color palette (background, black, and one accent color), and a centered composition framed by bold, conceptual text.
instructions: Use this template to generate similar images.

suggestions: Consider: muted, dreamy, elegant, epic, soft

feedback.TITLE QUALITY: The title, 'Cinematic Epic Still Photo,' is highly effective, meeting the length and clarity requirements. It uses strong visual descriptors ('Cinematic,' 'Epic'). The only minor deduction is for pattern adherence; while the core elements are present, optimizing the structure to strictly follow [Descriptor] + [Subject] + [Type] would ensure maximum search visibility.
feedback.TEMPLATE STRUCTURE: This is a flawless template. The subject variable is clearly marked as [SUBJECT], and the core style descriptors (e.g., 'volumetric haze,' 'cinematic color grading') dominate the prompt, ensuring consistent artistic output. The technical specifications are exceptional, including specific camera settings (85mm lens, F/1.2) and the required aspect ratio (--ar 16:9). It perfectly delivers on the 'Cinematic' promise.
feedback.VARIABLE EXAMPLES: This section is the weakest point of the package. While the examples provided demonstrate excellent range (e.g., mixing 'Cyberpunk Cityscape' with 'Abstract Idea'), the quantity is insufficient. Only 6 examples were provided, falling short of the required 8-10. This limits the user's ability to immediately grasp the full flexibility and capability of the prompt.
feedback.COMMERCIAL VIABILITY: The commercial strategy is robust. The prompt clearly targets high-value creative professionals (concept artists, marketers) and specific industry outputs (movie posters, album art). The suggested mid-tier pricing ($3.99) is appropriate for the high level of technical detail offered. The unique value proposition centers on the guaranteed cinematic quality and specific camera simulation (Arri Alexa), setting it apart from generic 'photo' prompts.
feedback.DESCRIPTION QUALITY: The description is professional and compelling. The hook ('Tired of flat images?') immediately addresses a common user pain point. All essential technical features are listed concisely, and the specified use cases are diverse and relevant to the target audience. This is a high-quality, marketplace-ready description.

priority_improvements: Increase the number of variable examples from 6 to at least 8. Focus on providing two additional examples that test the limits of scale (e.g., 'A Microscopic Organism' or 'The Surface of Jupiter').
Minor refinement to the title structure to strictly adhere to the [Descriptor] + [Subject] + [Type] pattern for maximum search engine optimization.

test_instructions: Fill in each variable with different values to test versatility.
Try using the first example prompt exactly as written as your baseline.
Test at least 3-5 different variations to ensure consistent style.
Experiment with Midjourney parameters like `--ar` or `--stylize`.
quality_checklist: Style Consistency: Does the style remain consistent?
Composition: Does the output match your compositional expectations?
Visual Quality: Is the output high-quality?
Variable Impact: Does changing variables produce meaningful differences?

commercial_description:
Instantly transform your ideas into gallery-worthy, minimalist screenprints that look like they were pulled from a high-end design studio.

*   **Style Consistency Locked In:** Generates clean lines, limited color palettes, and perfect typography every single time, guaranteeing that iconic, high-contrast screenprint aesthetic.
*   **Zero-Fuss Texture & Grain:** Automatically applies authentic halftone patterns and subtle print imperfections, eliminating the need for complex texture and post-processing commands.
*   **Subject Agnostic Brilliance:** Whether you need abstract landscapes, powerful single words, or stylized figures, this template adapts flawlessly while maintaining the core minimalist style.

Perfect for creating stunning digital wall art, high-impact social media assets, professional brand messaging, and sophisticated print-on-demand products.

Stop spending hours on complex prompting; this template is the one-line shortcut to professional design. If you can type an idea, you can create a masterpiece.
